CustomField.description: The Brick name. A Brick is a collection of Accounts and Contacts, normally in a common geographic area. This is used to store all Bricks of an address in the system.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Brick name. A Brick is a collection of Accounts and Contacts, normally in a common geographic area. This is used to store all Bricks of an address in the system.
CustomField.label: Brick
